the technical requirements of going into
an executive session are as follows the
meeting must begin as an open meeting
which is where we are now a member must
make a motion in open meeting for the
meeting to be closed to determine
whether or not the commission should
declare an executive session statute
does not a second to this motion but the

an open meeting if a majority votes to
close the meeting to make a

executive session the May will be closed
for this purpose no other business
during the closed interim shall be
considered until a vote has been taken
on whether or not to declare an
executive session in order to go into an
executive session majority must vote in
favor of it following this following the
closed session the commission must go
back into an open meeting and state the
reason for going into an executive
session and this reason Reon and total

minutes uh of the meeting following
